website_summaries.verdict: It's a good buy if you want a genuine leather collar at a  lower price.
pros: Constructed of durable leather with comfortable padding
Available in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Our testers note that the smallest size is still a bit too large for some small dogs and puppies, and the padding tends to fray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this collar because of some of the reviews stating it wasn't durable or fell apart and I am so glad I bought it! I got a large for my 5 mon old pitbull, it was a tad big but she's now 10 months and can still wear it! It's held up just fine and looks as good as it did 5 months ago. If this collar does ever wear out I'll get her another one forsure! I can not recommend it enough. It's durable and padded so it's comfortable for my sweet pitty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE FOR DOGS WITH SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this collar it seemed like really great quality for the price, and I was overall happy. I'm writing this review two months after my dog wearing because I realized that because of this collar, my dog now has a huge rash on her neck from the buckle. We looked at the collar and we think this is because the collar is double sewed on back for the buckle to be looped on. My dog is a short hair dachshund they're known for sensitive skin. So this dog collar would probably be fine for dogs with normal skin types, but be wary with sensitive skinned.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Affordable, Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY collar I've ever put on my dog - every time he's ready for the next size up, I just order another of these! I have a rambunctious one -year-old border collie, so I needed a durable collar - this is the perfect solution. Beautifully made, perfectly affordable, and so durable - I wouldn't even have to purchase new ones if my pup would stop growing!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Stancill

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the collar seems good however the sizing is not. I ordered the large after measuring my labs neck as 17". It just fits her on the last hole. In fact I don't know how well it will stay on since the tail of the collar isn't long enough to stay in the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I got three of the XS for my cats and they all came with a bell. The collar is very impressive quality (I gave it a bit to see if they would get scratched up by sharp claws in no time, but they all look new still. The colors are bright and they are not too heavy for the cats. Over all very impressed with these. I will be looking for them for all future collar wearing pets!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Jackson

customer_reviews.title: were true to color and a good size. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two collars for my two terriers. The came quickly, were true to color and a good size. Unfortunately, they irritated my girls skin. I do not believe they are real leather. I saw another person comment about it, and I thought I'd be ok if i took care to wash the collars before putting them on my dogs, but it did not help. My poor girls have both scratched gashes in their necks and had to be taken to the vet for special ointments. Straight into the trash the collars went :(
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wu

customer_reviews.title: This was WAY longer than advertised. I needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was WAY longer than advertised. I needed a collar longer than the standard 8.5"-10" ones they sell for cats locally. Really I just wish someone sold cat collars that were 10"-12". This is also thicker than I expected. Not really cat appropriate unless you have a Mainecoon or Savannah. He's wearing it, but he's just a big kitty. We did cut off about 2 inches of it because he was trying to chew on it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Extra small size is best for cats
customer_reviews.text: I first got the small size for my cat because I thought the extra small might be too small, but it turned out that the small size was too big, and I had to make an additional hole in the collar to make it fit around my cat's neck. I got the extra small size for my other cat, and it fits him perfectly! So for regular to small-sized cats, I recommend getting the smallest size. Unless your cat happens to be very big around the neck, the extra small size will do. I would recommend the extra small size for dogs like chihuahuas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs and they play with each other. The collar wasn't made durable enough to withstand the dogs play biting at each other's necks. If you do buy this remember to take it off when the dogs are playing or else you are going to end up buying another collar.
customer_reviews.author: Chris swan

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking - Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I completely overpaid for this POS. I can deal with the pleather the product is made of, but the buckles on this thing are so cheap that the paint was bubbling off when it arrived. I wouldn't dare use this thing to walk my dog as it the buckle would probably just snap, since it's poor quality plastic. I unfortunately have to keep this for the time being until I can find a better quality collar in this color. The only good thing is the brown color is a beautiful cognac color.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Extra small this was not.
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a long collar with extra holes punched to make it tight on a small pets neck. The problem is (and I have found this to be common) there is a good length of collar left hanging off the pet, a dog in this case, dogs live to chew this and ruin the collar. In most sewn collars this can’t be corrected without major work. I hope someone will make a decent small collar so dog owners don’t have to keep buying cat collars for their small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lorance

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely NOT leather
customer_reviews.text: This is a synthetic collar. Plastic, by any other name. That may be fine for a tiny dog or a cat, but aside from the clear dishonesty of labeling a poor quality item as a higher quality one, and charging accordingly, plastic collars are straight-up dangerous for larger animals. If you value the true durability of a real leather collar, do yourself a favor and don’t buy this garbage. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: If this is leather, I will eat it. It’s plastic or some kind of invented fake leather. It was on my labradoodle (read = gentle dog that doesn’t require super tough or durable things compared to other breeds) for a week before it fell off; the center of the buckle isn’t attached to anything and just fell out, rendering the buckle useless. Wish I would have spent double for real leather. You get what you pay for. This looks great, but it’s all Botox and silicone, if you get my drift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Empress

customer_reviews.title: It was beautiful when I first got it and looked great on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this collar for a few weeks now. My dog only wears a collar when we go out for her walks which happen about 2-3 times a day. It was beautiful when I first got it and looked great on her but it's deteriorated in the past few weeks and is cracking in places and feels a lot more flimsy than it did. It just doesn't look AS nice anymore. It still looks okay and works just fine. I think I should have spent a bit more to get one that would last a bit longer. Definitely not a bad purchase but not what I was personally hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice looking collar for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking collar for a great price! The xs size fits my 14 lb dogs neck perfectly at the last hole, and she seems to be quite comfortable with it. Very happy with purchase! Quality seems to be excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: RKG

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this collar is AMAZING. The bells are useless, but this is for a dog anyway. (DO NOT use this collar on cats. It does not break away.) It's very comfortable for my dog to wear and it looks awesome. One minor complaint is that the holes for the buckle are weirdly spaced. I either have to leave it way too loose on my dog or way too tight. I included a picture of how loose it is, and if I go to the next hole, I can't even get two fingers under his collar. He enjoys the collar, and if anything happens to this one, I'll probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not the proper size, even when ordered according to their size chart.
customer_reviews.text: While it states this collar (small) will fit a cat or dog up to 13 inches, it does not even become useable if you use it on the last two holes! My new puppy 's neck is approximatley 10.5"-11" and he can pull the collar off with one swift tug while on the leash. The buckle comes completely out, as the last two holes are so close to the end of the leather that they are not able to be properly secured. I would have ordered a medium and just dealt with the extra length for a while if i knew the small collar would be so flimsy at the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra R. Strohschein

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price, Size runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Really nice collar for the price. I got a medium so I was expecting it to be a little bigger, but it is roughly the same size (in both width and length) as a small collar of a different brand. Fits my 4.5 month old golden retriever puppy, with 2 holes left to grow. It will probably fit him for a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Coming Apart
customer_reviews.text: Update: Ordered in June and by October they have come unraveled and are falling apart. Not durable. June 2019 - These look wonderful ... but are not holding up at all. The threads are coming out already. I bought 3 and all 3 are doing the same thing ... the materials are coming apart. They have not torn or shredded yet. But they are coming unsewn. I still like them and think they were worth the buy, just disappointed to see them already coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, buy it :)
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I bought Red... have them on my 2 kitties, (10 lbs each) bought small... fits great on the last hole, when you first receive it. & bought a small for my small, 8lb pup, same thing, last hole. These seem to feel & act like real leather... so realise, they stretch a little bigger eventually (pulled by the lead.. boy kitties playing like "boys"..) doesn't change anything :) just make it a little smaller... go to the 2nd hole. (; Buy this collar. They're great quality & look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Bluu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! It's not real leather, but stylish, strong and gets the job done. My rambunctious pup behaves like a wild animal and resists almost all efforts to tame her. She can pull and pitch on the leash with this gorgeous collar and it holds. The previous nylon collar with snap close snapped and broke. Just make sure to read the description and order the correct size
customer_reviews.author: Q-New

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The collar itself is nice soft leather. My dog wore it once and while tied outside for least than 15 min, it broke. The leather came apart and my dog ran free. I’m very unhappy with this purchase. I bought it a while ago , but only went to put it on 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma from CT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog collar
customer_reviews.text: This dog collar works great so far for our 26lb French Bulldog. She has a large neck as frenchys do so it fits perfect. I purchased it because the synthetic collars rubbed the fur and skin around her neck raw and irritated. I researched it and found that leather collars are not supposed to do that so I found this one. It is a little bigger in height then I expected but it did say the size on the information. It works great and the pink is a perfect color for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised even as a repeat order
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was great, and the second (using the "reorder" function) was made of fake leather (looked more like plastic) and it was huge. Very disappointed that I didn't get the same product twice. And, it took several weeks to arrive from China.
customer_reviews.author: Carla T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and not too stiff
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these collars one on pink the other in purple for my German Shepard/pitbull cross dogs (its late and theure sleeping so not great pics) they fit ok, the dogs seem to like them(they aren't too stiff) and they look good. Over all seem too be good. We shall see how long they last. I just had a different leather collar last about 6 no where as the one my dog wore when I was a kid lasted his entire life (he was a 13 yo rough collie). I hope these last well.
customer_reviews.author: Reay Clan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar! I have a German shepherd pup and it is perfect for her. It is very sturdy and just the right thickness. It fits to size. I bought it for the buckle mainly. She had a snap collar before that kept coming open while we were walking. Scared me to death a couple of times. This collar does not do that. The rose collar is pretty and a bonus. I am not sure how easy it is to clean because I haven't had to do that yet; however, that is really not a concern of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 for my pups. Prple for my girl and blue for my boy. I love how thick and sturdy they are. I hate the nylon ones because we had a bad experience when they were 3 months old (they are 3 years old now) where one caught a tooth in the nylon while playing and they both freaked out. They haven't worn a collar sense. But since we are moving it is now a requirement. These are the perfect thing. They were a great size (largest size they have)for my two Danes and my pups didn't freak out at all when we put them on either. Will definitely buy again and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Our dogs stay inside and use a harness for walking so we don’t need heavy duty collars, just enough to hold their contact info. They are pretty light weight but very nice looking. We got a large for our 45-50 lb dogs. It fits the 50lb perfectly but should have sized down for the 45 pounder as it’s a bit long so we have to fold it back. I love the bells they come with and the colors are vibrant. Lovely Christmas stocking gifts for my puppers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meow
customer_reviews.text: Meow, cat like pink roomy leather cat no like bell but cat like to chase bell. bell was nice extra free bit.
customer_reviews.author: Penn Naim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collar, has held up
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 40 lb dog about 1.5 months ago. The colour hasn't rubbed off. I got it to use with a collar tag that slides directly onto the collar (instead of ones that dangle) and it works perfect. I was afraid the buckle would not stay put but it has held up so far. She seems to be comfortable, hasn't tried to take it off or had any reaction to the material. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: We got the 10.5 - 13 inch size for our Cavalier King Charles puppy "Otto". Honestly I didn't have super high hopes - but I was very pleasantly surprised! The color is vibrant and the quality looks good too! The leather is soft and Otto seems to love it! We've only had it for a few weeks, so I'll try to remember to post an update later on. All on all - completely worth the money and I will definitely purchase again if it holds up well!
customer_reviews.author: Deku

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Held together even after my puppy chewed on it.
customer_reviews.text: Had them over a year and they look great! On a side note-definitely not chew proof. I think it would be next to impossible to find something my little dog wouldn't be able to destroy. Even with her chewing on it, the stitching has remained in taxt and the leather has not separated from the padding. The holes also haven't stretched either. For only $10 definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Returns can be expensive for something inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Good news and bad news..........Good News- These collars are soft and fairly durable. I had bought a small collar for my puppy’s first collar about a year ago. It was time to replace it because she has grown so I went back to AOLOVE at Amazon and ordered a medium size collar. Unfortunately, a medium turned out to be huge. So I have to return it. I was pretty unhappy to see I have to play $5.99 to return a $14.99 collar. Be warned
customer_reviews.author: $hopper

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous collar, will break
customer_reviews.text: Very dangerous collar it broke jn half while on my terrier. She chased a cat and was gone like the wind. Thank God I caught her awbile later. Not sturdy or of good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Stop selling us fake leather!
customer_reviews.text: I feel cheated, because this does not appear to be real leather. It would not be the first time I was tricked into buying fake leather from Amazon. I thought I could expect it to last a long time, but now I expect I will be replacing it before very long. The extra length is not a problem, because I used a hair elastic as a keeper for the extra length.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: is not made from leather
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why there is so many positive reviews, it's not made from a real leather but from some synthetic substitute
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when receiving this collar. My pup is very tiny so I needed an extra small size and thought I finally found one. All they did was cut the end of a regular size collar to make it smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Redding

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This collar is awesome. The material is good quality. Padded on both sides. The hardware is nice and shiny also durable. I would definitely recommend this product. However, we have a 5-7lb Yorkie. The size small collar was too big for him. I would have had to cut the collar and that would have destroyed it. Wish they had an extra small. Sending it back.😔
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Not true leather
customer_reviews.text: The collar is not true leather, it's synthetic. My cat had a terrible allergic reaction to the synthetic material and ended up causing sores and loss of fur on his neck where the collar sat against his skin. This eventually led to a trip to the vet, a skin infection, and him wearing a cone for weeks because he wouldn't leave the sores alone. Use your money to buy something of the correct material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved everything, no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this collar when I first saw it, the bright colors and the leather type of material with the gold clips caught my eye. I got the colors red and blue for my dogs and when it came it looked exactly how it did on the picture, it also came with a additional ring to attach the name tag a and a bells if you have cats which I thought was cute. The sizing was also spot on and fits my dogs great, overall very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Al Armendariz

customer_reviews.title: Small sizing/different than expected but great collar!
customer_reviews.text: Great collar at a great price! My only complaint is the sizing and chart is a little confusing. I thought I was ordering a medium and received a rather small collar. It worked for a little while but my puppy has already put grown it so I ordered another in the larger size. Overall quality is great and looks much more expensive but the sizing is a bit strange to fallow.
customer_reviews.author: christopher m.

customer_reviews.title: Very good cat collar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat. She is just under a year old and very frisky. I tried a breakaway collar with her before this one, and she would take it off every time in about 30 seconds. I haven’t had any issues with her taking it off. She likes to paw at it and chew on her name tag when grooming, so the tag has seen better days. The collar is very durable though. I bought the extra small, and it fits well. There is plenty of room for the collar to grow with her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these collars now in the black XS and the black S. The collars look great especially for the price. They are thick and padded and haven’t scratched off. They didn’t even scratch off when my puppy used to itch at it. My puppy is about 30lb now and can still wear the size S at the second to last hole. He also fit the XS fine at about 8lb.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Excess length is bothersome
customer_reviews.text: Wish they'd put a second little strap for holding down excess length after the D-ring for the leash. Color is nice, but the excess length is bothersome and the leather holding strap is attached and not adjustable. You can actually see the problem there in the product's own photo with the yellow collar's extra length flapping about. Other than that, it's great. I have it on a large cat.
customer_reviews.author: A. SpenglerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice looking collar, BUT
customer_reviews.text: It’s virtually impossible to put the strip end through the loop. The loop is just too narrow. After struggling with it for several minutes, I finally was able to pull it through. When I tried again, hoping the loop has widened, the whole process started again. Back it goes. I can’t and won’t deal with products that are adding complications to my life.
customer_reviews.author: Enya

customer_reviews.title: durable product at a reasonable price...
customer_reviews.text: well made product, purchased for a street dog i adopted from the pound. she's usually getting into things or rolling around in the dirt so i needed a product which would hold up. have had this collar on her for a couple of months now and it still looks brand new. worth the price and can see this collar lasting long into the future. will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: After a few frustratingly WRONG collars😫, FINALLY ABSOLUTELY PERFECT. My baby gets the best! No matter what I have to go through. This is Taco. The fit is perfect. I love the 1/2" width and it's more comfortable for him. It's nicely padded, real leather, black to look manly enough, and very well made for the price. It has to be perfect so I can relax when he is out on his line, the way he runs hard and sometimes almost whiplashes himself when running to the length of his line. The collar won't come off and the tags are safe on the D-ring. Just beautiful!. I highly recommend 👍👍👍👍.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Our cat doesn't mind it at all
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we put this on our cat, she never even touched it. Our dog, when we put a collar on him, he would scratch at it for a week or two. She has not even scratched it wants. My daughter picked out this set that way she can change colors for the different holidays. Me, I don't care just as long as there's an ID tag on. If my daughter is happy, and it's a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: It is great quality though
customer_reviews.text: Since they are padded, they run a little smaller. It barely fits my small dog. If you are close to the max size, go up one. It is great quality though. Very nice, and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Dbutler

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Collar my Sensitive-Skinned Baby Can Use
customer_reviews.text: I would have paid so much more for this, if I knew how well it would work. My dog has protein and skin allergies. All other collars and harnesses rub and irritate her skin, causing little bumps and sores. Even on a special diet and with medication, her collar bothered her. I had been looking for a soft, leathery, buckle collar. I found this and it works fantastic. It is a little big on her, but she has a big head, so it actually works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long enough
customer_reviews.text: Had the collar on my husky for probably 6-8 months. Collar has showed no signs of wear, fraying, coming apart, nothing and had to put her on a lead and with one pull the collar just broke. Very disappointed because I really thought this collar would hold up longer and it looked like it was made well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the extra money. Strong, soft, & my kitties loved them.
customer_reviews.text: We just received three of these collars for our kitties. they are awesome & are sturdy just like the ad said. the inside is very soft and two of our three kitties adapted to them very well. and didn’t even try to take them off. so I would highly recommend these even though they’re a little more expensive they’re worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: In between sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an extra small and small as I wasn’t sure which would fit. The XS is too small, the last hole doesn’t even fit the leftover piece into the little loop. The small was too big and after adding more holes there is an excess of length I’ll have to trim off and hope it doesn’t fray. Durability is amazing and the color is bright. Apart from the size issue there are no issues.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Dog likes it. I got the red and there are not scratch marks on it, even though my dog scratches his neck / collar pretty frequently. When I put his flea meds on it will sometimes get on the collar (underneath it) and his back gets what looks like blackish ink where the flea med oil was. However, it goes away within a day and without me wiping it off. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: C-Dog

customer_reviews.title: POS waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste you money it’s not leather it’s stretches out so much that just after two days I had to put holes in it to make it tighter I’d return it but I put holes in it
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Love these collars!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my cat a couple years ago, and he never even scratched at it! I was so impressed! After 2 years it still looks great! I purchased another one for my other cat but....she hated it, so I transferred hers to my new tiny puppy who is still wearing it, and it is holding up extremely well! They are durable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Mostly perfect, missing 1 thing for final star
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, seems to be comfortable, missing easy tag-loop to hang name/info from... I tried looping her name tag around the part with the needle but it is so thick it was a painful struggle. Once I got it on, I couldn't get her name tag to face forward. It's a little wide for our small kitty but it looks real nice and feels smooth and padded to the touch. Kitty didn't seem to be bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Dunyah

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, big bells, no band further down to keep extra length in place.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly nice color (purple) but the bells that it came with (2) were silver, which doesn't necessarily match the with the gold accents. I went with the size small (10.5" - 13") for my Chihuahua and it fits well for being on the last hole since I was concerned the extra small would be too small. Downside is that there is no extra band further down to hold the extra part in place. I can remedy this myself but I wish there was the extra band.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pink collar
customer_reviews.text: Really cute collar. Matched it with a rose gold name tag. Love this shade of pink and couldn’t find anything else like it. Has held up well over a few months. Might not last forever, but for only $10, I’ll just order a new one in the future if need be. — eisley_the_dal on Instagram
customer_reviews.author: Dana Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I got this for my male cat actually he is a bit of a muscle meow so the snap lock cat collars he just scratches right off and flings across the room. this one he actually doesnt mind took him two minutes, literally to get used to and he has worn it for two months now and never once has he been able to just kick it off. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Kovynev

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stand up to the dog's sibling
customer_reviews.text: Just received the collar on Oct 18th, and has already been chewed through and destroyed by the sibling to the dog that was wearing it on Oct 21st. Not the fault of the seller, but making potential buyers aware that leather isn't always going to prevent this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this collar for my pup. It’s very nice quality, and the color (I got the yellow) is spot on what I expected. It’s great if you’re looking for something a bit more stylish and sturdy than a snap on. My pup is a bullypit so I ordered the medium and the smallest notch is still quite a bit too big, but that’s what I wanted so she can grow into it. overall very very pleased 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Not real leather and very easy to break
customer_reviews.text: This is a oversized wide collar doesn't look like on the picture It's like a belt for male and hand bag leash. Doesn't look good Maybe good for some dogs but not my.
customer_reviews.author: Verified True Feed Back

customer_reviews.title: Needed a tradional collar, not plastic clasp
customer_reviews.text: we have an escape artist who manages to pop the plastic clasp on the other dog collars, so we had to go for a more traditional dog collar with the metal hook. I am so glad someone still makes them because it was the difference of her being in a collar or going to a harness, and I really don;t want to go the way of the harness to keep her from escaping. fits great and I expect it to work for us for years to come. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Robin T

customer_reviews.title: Good collar
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this collar despite some varying reviews. This collar was purchased for my Ragdoll ( a larger cat) it fits her nicely (not too tight not too loose) I got her the smallest size of course, in the brown color. I think it’s a great collar and it seems durable granted she’s not being walked so the collar isn’t being tugged at at all. But for her it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: The perfect collar!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this collar. It looks just like the picture and is actually really good quality. A huge plus was that it was three days early and came in a Sunday! Edit: it's been a couple of weeks and I'm actually very in love with this collar will definitely be purchasing again in the near future! The collar is very nicely made and stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: Norwegianincalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Love the collar!
customer_reviews.text: I have a puppy and she was using a that kind of fabric collar with buckle which can adjust the length. It always loosened itself when after on leash for a while so I wanted to get one of these ones so the length doesn’t change. There are so many leather collars on Amazon and I’m glad I chose this one! It’s of very good quality and looks very nice. It’s durable as well. The price is awesome too. I wish they have more colors like white or yellow or orange so I can buy a few and alternate them :) Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: GE Tong

customer_reviews.title: Not leather
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and a good size. 2 stars because it is advertised as leather but is definitely not. Looks like a pink vinyl layer on top of a black vinyl layer.
customer_reviews.author: ALICE

customer_reviews.title: like cotton. I bought a large for my 36lb ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Made. Too too too thin, too soft, like cotton. I bought a large for my 36lb Boston, I don't believe it can hold her and durable. NO for medium or large dog. Color and gold buckle is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: SpoiledBoston

customer_reviews.title: Cheap inferior metal buckles
customer_reviews.text: Metal plating rubbed off in the first week. Leaves black residue on our white cat and white chihuahua. If metal components were solid stainless, this would be a 10 star rated product. Leather quality is excellent. They ruined it with cheap metal buckles.
customer_reviews.author: TableRocked

customer_reviews.title: Cute collar! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Collar looks great on my cat. Male cat, pretty chunky. Bought him the smallest size, and he’s using it at the largest hole comfortably. The collar feels thick and sturdy, and it doesn’t appear to cause him any discomfort. Came with a pink and blue bell to add. It was a nice bonus, but unfortunately, the bells were a little too large for my taste. Overall, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Works for cats too!
customer_reviews.text: Its been...at least a year now, the collar still holding together! Some little scratches from my cats nails but its to be expected. Only complaint would be the metal began to lose the gold color. But again Its to be expected. He is 11.3 pounds if that helps with sizing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Namine Zenitram

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL and very soft!  Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Far nicer and a much better quality than what I was expecting. I have a Great Dane puppy that will be going through quite a few collars before she reaches full size so we needed something inexpensive yet sturdy and attractive. This collar fits all of the criteria. I'm very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: DebRose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Looks great on her and feels durable. Good quality for the price and the fit is perfect. I did measure her neck with fabric measuring tape and it is true to size. She seems comfortable in it and hasn’t paid it any kind. It’s also pretty lightweight. Stitching is consistent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Best collar for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect collar for small dogs! Our first collar lasted 3.5 years (of daily wear) and we just received our second one. The collar is not too heavy or stiff, but it’s very durable. The pink is also the perfect shade of pink. The collar isn’t too wide (which has been a problem with other collars), and not too thin. I’ve bought several more expensive/ premium leather collars, only to return them because this one really is much better (and way less expensive!). I highly recommend this collar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute and feel very comfortable. The collar has some cushion to it so it is not stiff and does not have a smell to it. I really like the bells that come with it because I can keep track of where my weenie dog puppy us much easier and know when she's right under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: E. B.

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but I expect dog collars to last....3,4,5,6,7 years because that's been my experience with quality leather collars. This collar isn't quality. It's bubbling and peeling after a few months! With 3 dogs and 3 active kids I don't have time to stop for returns or to think about reordering another collar!
customer_reviews.author: The view

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to measure your pet's neck. Mine was very borderline so I got the bigger size, when I should have gotten the smaller. Bit big for my cat, but just a little. He's never tried to take it off, but if you have a collar hating cat, they would be able to get it off easily. I love it though, great quality. No complaints with the product at all, and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: I bought this soft leather collar and placed it on her neck and she has not even tried to remove it and has seemed rather proud to finally have a necklace like the other cats
customer_reviews.text: The cat that I bought this for had taken her previous 'cat collar' off and hid it and refused to wear it more than a few minutes due to a rough part. I bought this soft leather collar and placed it on her neck and she has not even tried to remove it and has seemed rather proud to finally have a necklace like the other cats. I would definitely say this is a great item!
customer_reviews.author: MrsP

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my white pitbull who's allergic to plastic! Yes, plastic! Her world was full of plastic, from feeding bowls, to collar clasps, to swimming pool! Everything (except her beloved pool) went bye bye, along with her other allergens and she's a new and much happier dog! It's hard to find plastic free, affordable collars! This one hit all the marks!!
customer_reviews.author: Dede V.Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Be weary...
customer_reviews.text: The color was not as expected. Be careful if your dog has sensitive skin as this material might give them a rash. Also the sizing is a little confusing. Either way I had to keep them and could not return because my dog chewed it up while wearing it. The soft faux leather did not survive, however the buckle is excellent material, if you dog loves to chew may not be suitable for this product. The color is a little lighter than I would have liked but it still looks good on my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Danely Cerrato

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not highest quality
customer_reviews.text: These collars look like they cost way more than they do and are very attractive, however, they aren't the most durable. I've bought two collars. Both of the hardware tarnished within a few months. My puppy, who is under 50 pounds, also broke the leather collars in half twice while being tied up outside. These probably weren't the best collar to use on a tie out anyways, but never the less, I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good quality for a very low price
customer_reviews.text: This dog collar is a steal at less than $10. The construction is very high quality. Two layers of leather (real leather) front and back side. Riveted end where strong buckle is located. Good stitching. Strong ring attached for dog tags, etc. Looks like a well made men's belt, but shrunk down in size. Should last very long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend but is not excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product and cute. The only thing I’ve seen that I’m not a fan of is that the gold hardware coloring wears off easily when trying to attach the leash. And the loop is rather small which makes it a little difficult to attach.
customer_reviews.author: jessicahg

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 60 pound weimaraner and it has held up great! she likes to pull occasionally and it has held up wonderfully. It cleans up very nicely with soap and water and still looks like new. It fits her great and is soft and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have two mini dachshunds. They were going through collars like crazy! I would go to the pet store and buy new ones every month just about. They would always turn up dirty and gross. My girls are not even really outdoor dogs so that made no sense to me. These were the perfect option. They are holding up very well and the colors are very nice as well. Highly recommend these for a sturdy collar.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Quality collar at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Love these collars so much that I bought extras as gifts. They're sturdy and the color doesn't fade. The gold finish on the ring and buckle does fade over time to a more brassy color. Overall it's a great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: JD Mesh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic and well made collar, it is very soft and fits well it has held up like new on an active indoor outdoor Pomeranian! Great buy especially at this price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, order a larger size
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the collar is beautiful. Purchased the light pink and love the gold accents. Comes with 2 cute bells too, one blue and one pink. However, I ordered the wrong size and to return the product the shipping will cost just about the same as the item; pointless. Just beware, order a size up, runs small
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I ordered her a large green collar and she looks beautiful as ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a white lab and she has an allergy to the typical collar material. I ordered her a large green collar and she looks beautiful as ever. No issues with it. I read review about it having a poor durability to water. I have not had any such issues. The only "issue" I've had with it is the gold plating on the metal portion has faded, but I don't mind that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Her old collar rubbed and left a rash. This one doesn’t do that at all. It was a little large. So I had to put an extra hole in it and cut down the excess leather. Which was poking out. It fits her now. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Elise

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is Off
customer_reviews.text: I deducted one star because the sizing seems to be off. My dog’s neck is 16 inches, so I purchased a large. It was way too big. Even on the smallest hole, the collar fit too loose. Ended up replacing it for a medium and it was perfect, with room to grow. The color is cute and the collar itself looks great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EKS

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have been wearing these both indoor and outdoor for 9 months, and they still fit perfectly! The leather still looks great (with a few marks of wear and tear), and I am super impressed with how long they have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Not in love but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It shipped very quickly and the color was true to the picture, it’s just very large. It’s not the best quality but nice enough for the price. I was hoping it would be more resistant to dirt as my dogs run and wrestle a lot and there’s already fraying and dirt in the outer rims. The yellow is a very nice pastel, just probably meant for larger, less active dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love the collar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar will buy again. It comes with two bells a pink and blue. My cat has chewed through one of the bells sonit was nice to have a second one. I do believe that the D ring should be smaller because the bell is set quote low so cats can chew on the bell. Other than that my cat looks really adorable on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pint Sized Companion Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My pint sized companion likes the collar. It’s a bit stiff which is good for my tiny dog, limits the points of pressure on her little neck, every light and easy to clean. This collar has retained its color and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for good collars!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 3 cats and a small dog new collars to put their tags on (we moved and they needed tags with new address on them). The collars worked great and fit all 4 so I'm very happy! Definitely would order again.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.H. Nosenbook

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This seems pretty well made. It's rather bulky for my 5 lb cat but I think it would fit a larger cat very nicely. I will keep it though because she keeps scratching up and ruining all the nylon collars I get for her. This one seems like it will last. The Bell that comes with it is massive and has a pretty big ring so it hangs really low on her too but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: bebe

customer_reviews.title: Cute BUT........
customer_reviews.text: Cute... BUT did not hold up to sharp little teeth. Dog demolished it into pieces within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: KING123

customer_reviews.title: Great for price point!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great color for the price. Bought the Kelly green for my new white puppy and it is made well for the price point. I wasn’t planning on using it long since she’s just a puppy and the edges look like they will fray. But it is a great color and exactly the style I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Croxford

product_meta.title: AOLOVE Basic Classic Padded Leather Pet Collars for Cats Puppy Small Medium Dogs
product_meta.description:
Color:Pink| Size:10.5"-13" Neck * 0.6" Wide
Please check the size before you confirm the order and we are always here for you.

Size:
X-Small: 0.6"*11.8"(1.5cm*30cm), Neck 8-10"(20-26cm)
Small: 0.6"*14.5"(1.5cm*37cm), Neck 10.5-13"(27-33cm)
Medium: 0.8"*16.5"(2.0cm*42cm), Neck 11.5-15"(29-38cm)
Large: 1.0"*20.0"(2.5cm*51cm), Neck 14.5-18.5"(37-47cm)

Package: 
1*leather pet collar 

About our services If you have any questions, please leave your messages, we promise to reply you within 24 hours and offer you best services If you are satisfied with our products, please don't forget to leave Positive Feedback, we will appreciate your encourage If you are not satisfied, before you leave the Negative/Neutral feedback, contact us and let me know that, we will resolve the problem till you satisfy.

Thanks for coming to my store and enjoy your shopping!
feature_bullets: Please check the pet's exact neck size before you confirm the order / Small size: 0.6"*14.5"(1.5cm*37cm), Neck 10.5-13"(27-33cm)
Strong and durable high quality leather,Nickel-plated hardware and heavy duty D-ring to help protect its neck
Fashionable and personalized designed for your pet
